message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I am willing to pay $85 for it. Looking forward to your response.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $87. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. Let me know if you're interested!
